title: Employment Contract
obligations: Employer must pay salary on the last working day of each month.

clauses.title: Confidentiality
clauses.originalText: Employee shall not disclose confidential information.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.originalText: Either party may terminate with two weeks notice.
clauses.simplifiedText: Job can end with two weeks notice from either side.

summary: Defines employment terms, confidentiality, compensation, and termination notice.
